attributes.action: Allow dual British/EU citizenship to those who voted Remain in EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
By allowing a proposed dual nationality British citizens who wish would be able to maintain a healthy and open relationship with the rest of the world while those who voted to Leave the EU would not be affected and balance would be maintained.
Change would be required by the EU to allow the issue of this status but friends do not abandon friends when they need their help. 
Forcing change on the minority, be that a sizable one should not be pushed through without creating a option of choice.
attributes.background:
Following the result of the EU referendum almost 50% of the population of the UK will eventually be forced to give up their European passports.
This is particularly true for Scotland and Malta but also, for example, 60% people in Norwich. These people should not be ignored.
